|flash1type = NAND <!-- (Winbond W29N02GV, 8-bit parallel) --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF2G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075;Q, QCA8075, 0VV, PU63626B, U063601; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 14:91:82 |oui = 14:91:82

|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9886;Q, QCA9886, 0VV, NE643LNK, E064304; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 2 |rad3rxchains = 2 |rad3sstreams = 2 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad3ac = 867 |nqam3 = 400 |rad3n = 300 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "EWW516-A1-BL REV:025(XC)" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
<small> '''Note:''' A [https://fccid.io/Q87-EA8300/Letter/C2PC-Letter-3989970 Class II Permissive Change] on September 11, 2018 to [https://fccid.io/Q87-EA8300 Q87-EA8300] which was originally :for the [[Linksys EA8300|EA8300]]/[[Linksys EA8250|EA8250]] added two new models ([[Linksys MR8300|MR8300]] and [[Linksys MR8250|MR8250]]) which are marketed using :"Mesh" terminology. Both new models have a "new LED design" and both support 256QAM. :The different names are used for marketing purposes. </small>
{{WiFiCert|WFA79677|10/12/2018}}
*Web GUI: http://LinksysSmartWiFi.com
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/linksys/linksys_mr8300 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/mr8300 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq40xx |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = Bluetooth |comment = snapshot and 23.05+ need a boot variable change before installation. Read doc. }} Please insert instructions here
